name: Parsley Potatoes
keywords: butter, parsley, potato, gluten-free, vegetarian, side dish
recipeIngredient: 2 1/2 pounds small potatoes, peeled and cut, if necessary, into equal-size pieces (about 3 to 4 potatoes per person)
2 tablespoons fresh chopped parsley or other fresh herbs like basil or tarragon

recipeInstructions.text: Place the potatoes in a saucepan with cold water to cover and add the salt. Bring to a boil, lower the heat and cook, covered, until tender about 20 minutes. Drain and place back on the stove for 1 minutes to dry. Toss briefly with the parsley and butter.
To serve, arrange 2 salmon patties on each serving plate and spoon the potatoes around them. Serve with the sauce on the side.
